entity.name: Greg Abbott
entity.description: US Governor of Texas, Greg Abbott

text:
At this moment 36 years ago I was in a Houston Emergency Room. 

My back was broken & I was paralyzed for life. 

Little did I know that I would one day become Governor of the great state of Texas.

We all face difficult challenges that we can overcome. 

Never give up. https://t.co/C4QcMYB0wr
